title: [K-12] Flipped Learning and Peer Instruction-Based Program for Improving English Reading Comprehension and Learning Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English reading proficiency and experience with basic digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners primarily consist of students or job seekers, conducting asynchronous learning via digital devices. Formative assessments periodically evaluate engagement and reading proficiency improvements.

learning_goals: Learners improve English text analysis skills by 20%+ through self-directed learning with digital resources after 4 weeks
Learners increase class participation by 30%+ through peer instruction activities (discussions and feedback)
Learners achieve average reading comprehension scores of 80+ points on formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
